item.title: Dumped oil tins, dumped wooden palette, litter, 2nd November
item.description:
By roadside in tree line (visible from road), numerous dumped restaurant oil tins, a dumped wooden palette to the left of those, and litter. Please can area be tidied as looks neglected currently. Iâ€™m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. Tap to see exactly where it is: ///yappy.beats.move https://w3w.co/yappy.beats.move
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A223, London

item.title: Racist graffiti, 2nd November

item.title: Blocking Road, 2nd November
item.description:
The residents of 6 Eaglesfield Road have, for many months, been pushing their wheelie bins into the road to save their parking spaces. The bins are kept on the pavement outside their address when the cars are parked outside. These manoeuvres are often undertaken several times a day, sometimes during early morning and/or late evenings causing unacceptable noise disturbance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eaglesfield Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep Pothole, 2nd November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Crescent, Church End, London
